structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Descent And Distribution, Wills, Estates Of Deceased Persons And Absentees, Guardianship, Conservatorship And Trusts
Effect Of Apparently Simultaneous Deaths Upon Devolution And Disposition Of Property, Including Proceeds Of Insurance

law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 31, 2012. Repealed by 2008, 521, Sec. 8. See 2008, 521, Sec. 44 as amended by 2010, 409, Sec. 23 and 2011, 224.] This chapter may be cited as the Uniform Simultaneous Death Law.
